dcterms:description: This dataset is collected by well-known business review websites in the US, covering restaurants, shopping malls, hotels and other fields, usually used for business venue recommendation. It includes four behaviors: dislike, neutral, tip, and like.
dcterms:title: Yelp

dcterms:description: This dataset is collected by one of the largest E-commerce platforms in China. User interactions include page view, tag-as-favorite, add-to-cart, and purchase.
dcterms:title: Tmall

dcterms:creator: Lianghao Xia

Jian Pei
Liefeng Bo
dcterms:description: This dataset is about online retail scenarios with explicit multi-type user-item interactions. It includes three behaviors: tag-as-favorite, add-to-cart, and purchase.
dcterms:title: Retail
